name: Apollo 10½: A Space Age Childhood
name_cn: 阿波罗10½号：太空时代的冒险
summary: Apollo 10½: A Space Age Childhood (also known as Apollo 10½) is a 2022 American animated coming-of-age science fiction film written, directed, and produced by Richard Linklater. It stars Glen Powell, Jack Black, Zachary Levi and Josh Wiggins. Parts of the film, which was shot in live-action, will be animated using a technique similar to the rotoscoping used in Linklater's Waking Life (2001) and A Scanner Darkly (2006). The film takes place during the 1969 Apollo 11 Moon landing and will explore children on Earth's fantasies about the event. Apollo 10½ premiered at South by Southwest on March 13, 2022, and is scheduled to premiere on Netflix on April 1, 2022.
